punt.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a long thin boat with a flat bottom that you move by pushing a long pole against the bottom of the river
punt.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: in rugby or American football, the action of kicking the ball after dropping it from your hands
punt.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: the standard unit of money used in the Republic of Ireland before the Euro
punt.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to go on a river in a punt
punt.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: Pete punted us back to the boatyard.
punt.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: in rugby or American football, to drop the ball from your hands and kick it
punt.translation[1].definitions[2].defin: to kick a ball hard so that it goes a long way
